name: World In Progress?
description:
A quiz game to test all your knowledge about everything terrible happening in the world!
Read the headline and try to find out if it's real or fake. How many can you get right?
Is everything backwards enough for you?

Controls: Mouse or touchscreen. Click to speed up text.

A game by Cinzia Damonte and Jonas Beduschi
Special thanks to Roma

Sound effects by Kenney
Music by Chris Logsdon
Fonts by Damien Gosset and Roberto Mocci
